Charlie Kirk was one of America's
loudest political voices with a huge
following amongst young voters. aged
just 31, he was an ally of President
Trump and an activist who mobilized
those who agreed with him by debating in
public with those who did not. In those
debates and with a daily podcast,
Charlie Kirk quoted controversy on
issues like gender and race. His death
has shone a light on those issues and on
others like free speech and gun control
and the partisan divide in America.
We'll look back at the 36 hours since
the shooting. the reaction to it and the
hunt for his killer. Let's start by
going back to that college event on
Wednesday. Charlie Kirk appeared at
around 12:10 p.m. local time.
Throwing hats into the crowd at the Utah
Valley University as part of his
American comeback tour. The event began
like any of his other events. But
shortly after he began engaging with

you know how many mass shooters there

years?
Counting or not counting gang violence.
Great.

Yeah. We ran about 15 30 seconds into a

And all I'm saying is please God. Please
